attributes.action: extend two year old funding to all family with a household income of under 30k
attributes.additional_details: From a mothers view I can see the damage in social development and confidence this has had on my 17 month old from not being able to have the opportunity to mix with others their age
attributes.background: Consider the impact of covid-19  has had on young babies and toddlers that have missed out on social interaction via baby groups and sure start

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Extend entitlements to free childcare for 2-year-olds to all working families
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/317697
